name: Meiofauna from Lynher estuary in microcosms with contaminated sediment from the Fal estuary
description: Experimental data - sediment from Fal estuary (field-contaminated with heavy metals) seeded with meiofauna from Lynher estuary in microcosms
license: This work is licensed under a  Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License
citation: Somerfield, P.J. & Austen, M. (1993). Meiofauna from Lynher estuary in microcosms with contaminated sediment from the Fal estuary. Plymouth Marine Laboratory (PML), UK.

provider.legalName: The Marine Biological Association of the United Kingdom
